text: a great way to eat healthy is to make
sure that you have healthy foods in your
fridge and this carrot spinach soup with
dill makes a really large batch do you
have it on hand for the entire week so
let's get cooking
so heat a large pan over medium heat and
add two tablespoons of olive oil one of
the great things about cooking with
spices and herbs is that you don't need
to use too much fat because you have a
lot of flavor in those ingredients to
this add 1 diced onion and let this
saute till soften about 6 minutes this
onions going to provide that really nice
depth of flavor I like to season onions
with just a little bit of salt as
they're sauteing it helps break them
down a little bit faster
these onions are nice and soft they
smell amazing
and we're gonna add 5 cups of chopped
carrots which will be about 5 to 7
carats depending on your size give that
a good stir
quarter teaspoon turmeric turmeric is
really nice flavor but it also is a
great digestive aid and then season
generously with salt so stir this all
together and you want to make sure
you're toasting your spices in the oil
that's really gonna help draw all the
flavor now we're gonna add 10 cups of
water because this is a big batch soup
bring the soup to a boil then reduce it
to a simmer and we're gonna let all the
vegetables just meld and get even more
flavorful it's gonna be about 30 minutes
vegetables are nice and tender I'm going
to add green beans that I've chopped
into about half-inch pieces so these
will just cook for a couple minutes
until they're bright green and just
crisp tender and then we will finish the
soup on the counter it's been about two
minutes and my green beans are just
tender and I'm going to finish this soup
off the heat with fresh dill and spinach
so to serve you add chopped dill which
just smells so wonderful it's very
comforting is also very soothing if you
have an upset stomach and fresh baby
spinach which is great because
everybody's always looking for a serving
of dark leafy greens now to this I'm
going to activate it with my hot soup
just ladle the hot soup right over
be sure all the pieces are in there and
then cover it with a plate and what this
is going to do is very lightly steam the
greens and help all the flavors come
together this will take about five
minutes so let's add a squeezed fresh
lemon this just kind of wakes everything
up and now time to taste mmm it's so
delicious it's so earthy it's just
really soothing not only is it good for
you it tastes amazing
